Author: TheAllMightiest
Text: That's what I was thinking!! Profs also usually don't care enough to ask for a doctor's note.

Author: pyrehoula
Text: Say you’re on an elimination diet, so you’re can only eat a small list of things without compromising the results. If they push for a reason, you can say you have IBS and you’re trying to find your trigger foods. There’s no reason why the professor should hound you for that.   IBS is actually super common, so it’s not like you’re claiming to have some rare form of cancer or something. A good 50-60% of people I know have it to some degree.   Good luck!
